page.title: 08CHILD LEISURE, GILLINGHAM
page.content: We interviewed 102 children about their leisure activities. Most children do{sport;}there were thirty five who do sport for enjoyment and because it keeps them fit. Eight {cycle}for the same reason. Eleven like{playing}and three go{camping, also for enjoyment. We found that ten liked{reading}because it is interesting, relaxing, pleasureable and helps improve their reading. Two enjoyed{collecting}things such as stickers and mice and ten do{art because it is interesting. Three like listening to{music}for pleasure and they enjoy learning the songs. Five watch{television}because they have nothing else to do and they enjoy it. Five said they enjoyed playing with {computers}because it helped them learn. You may be surprised but five do work around the house.
